name: remove_user_from_usergroup
description: Remove a user from a user group

input_parameters.name: usergroup_id
input_parameters.description: The ID for the user group to remove the user from

input_parameters.name: user_ids
input_parameters.description: A list of user IDs to remove from the User Group

output_parameters.name: usergroup_id
output_parameters.description: The ID for the user group that now contains the removed user(s)
